title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
OB: When building on version 20020228 and selecting some files to export using the jar export functionality, if the user enters "test" as the jar name, it creates a jar file called "test" instead of "test.jar".
EB: When exporting files using the jar export functionality, if the user does not specify a file extension for the jar name, the software should automatically append the ".jar" suffix to the file name.
SR: The software should be modified to automatically add the ".jar" suffix to the jar file name when the user does not specify a file extension during the jar export process.
